column4: Cant install Ubundu from the Install disk or the LIVE CD. I have 2 partitions one Windoze XP sp2 the other Xandros Linux... I tried to install Ubuntu, (wanted to replace Xandros)  it goes threw the text and stuff then it stops and I get this crazy multi-colored screen. it's completely garbled no text no pictures nothing.. just a bright  crazy colors. . My computer is ... Dell 9300 1GB Ram, 100GB HD Centrino...  I tried "boot: linux vga=771 nopic
sounds like your MBR is busted, buddy
